title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the high-level architecture of the P2P Content Delivery Network, including node roles, communication protocols, and data structures.

title: Develop Node Implementation - Frontend
description: Create the frontend implementation for a peer node, handling UI and user interactions.

title: Develop Node Implementation - Backend
description: Create the backend implementation for a peer node, handling data storage, processing, and communication.

title: Develop Content Delivery Algorithm
description: Design and implement an efficient algorithm for content delivery in the P2P network.

title: Implement Content Request and Response Mechanisms
description: Develop mechanisms for sending content requests and receiving responses in the P2P network.

title: Test Node Functionality
description: Perform unit tests and integration tests to ensure proper functioning of individual nodes.

title: Document System Architecture and Design Decisions
description: Write clear, concise documentation detailing the system architecture, design decisions, and implementation details.

title: Review and Provide Feedback on System Design Document
description: Review the system design document for accuracy, completeness, and potential issues.
dependencies: Document System Architecture and Design Decisions
